```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(palmerpenguins)
ice <- read_csv(here::here("data", "glacial_volume_loss_copy.csv"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(ice, aes(x = Annu_sea_rise)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.14, breaks = seq(from = -0.2, to = 1, by = 0.14)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0), limits = c(0, 12), breaks = seq(from = -1, to = 11, by = 2)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(from = -0.2, to = 1, by = 0.15))

ggplot(ice, aes(x = Annu_sea_rise)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 8) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0), limits = c(0, 12), breaks = seq(from = -1, to = 11, by = 2)) 

ggplot(ice, aes(x = Year, y = Cumu_sea_rise)) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(ice, aes(x = Year, y = Cumu_vol_change)) +
  geom_point()

penguins %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  count()
 
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_histogram(breaks = seq(from = 165, to = 240, by = 5), aes(fill = species), alpha = 0.6) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(from = 165, to = 240, by = 5), expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0))
```
